2.Name: Pelican
2.Text: Welcome to the Tunicate, salvager. (Press 'Z' to advance text)

2.Name: Pelican
2.Text: This submersible will serve as our base of operations for this very important mission.

2.Name: Pelican
2.Text: I would love to give you a warmer welcome, but protocol dictates that you must first attend to some instructional exercises.

2.Name: Pelican
2.Text: When I open the airlock, please walk over to the Training Room and click the Tutorial option from the menu. (Use WASD to move)

3.Name: Pelican
3.Text: I believe you still have some tutorials to attend to, Salvager.

3.Name: Pelican
3.Text: Remember, we need you to go to the Training Room to complete the Tutorial.

tutorial0.Name: Pelican
tutorial0.Text: Now, let us begin with the basics. Use 'Z' to advance dialog.

tutorial0.Name: Pelican
tutorial0.Text: Use 'A' and 'D' to move. Use 'E' to interact with objects like switches.

tutorial1.Name: Pelican
tutorial1.Text: Press 'W' to jump. You can jump up to 2 times.

tutorial2.Name: Pelican
tutorial2.Text: In addition to this, you have 2 more mobility options at your disposal; Hover and Airblast.

tutorial2.Name: Pelican
tutorial2.Text: Hovering is performed by holding 'W' with no more jumps available. This allows the player to float and rise steadily.

tutorial2.Name: Pelican
tutorial2.Text: Right-Click to perform a directional Airblast. This will quickly propel you in the opposite direction.

tutorial2.Name: Pelican
tutorial2.Text: Airblasting can also be used to knock away enemies and reflect projectiles!

tutorial2.Name: Pelican
tutorial2.Text: Both of these options cost Fuel, indicated in the blue bar in the bottom left of the screen.

tutorial2.Name: Pelican
tutorial2.Text: Fuel regenerates slowly over time, or in bursts from picking up a Fuel Pickup.

tutorial3.Name: Pelican
tutorial3.Text: Press 'S' to fast-fall in midair or fall through drop-through platforms.

tutorial4.Name: Pelican
tutorial4.Text: Interact with weapons to pick them up ('E'). You can carry up to 3 weapons at once.

tutorial4.Name: Pelican
tutorial4.Text: Fire weapon with Left-Click. Reload with 'R'. You can switch between weapons with either mouse wheel or number keys.

tutorial4.Name: Pelican
tutorial4.Text: Use your newlyfound weapons to destroy the 3 targets to open that door.

tutorial5.Name: Pelican
tutorial5.Text: Interact with Active-Items to pick them up ('E'). Your Active-Item is visible in the bottom right corner of the screen.

tutorial5.Name: Pelican
tutorial5.Text: Active items can have a variety of effects and are used with the 'SPACEBAR'. These items have cooldowns before they can be used again.

tutorial5.Name: Pelican
tutorial5.Text: When you are ready, use that portal to get into your first fight!

tutorial6.Name: Pelican
tutorial6.Text: Simply touch the Black Box in the next room to finish the Tutorial!

tutorial6.Name: Pelican
tutorial6.Text: Now that you are armed, you can use the weapon-operated elevator to explore the rest of the ship!

tutorial7.Name: Pelican
tutorial7.Text: On Floor 2, to your left is the Quartermaster! Spend your hard-earned scrip here for new equipment!
(For the purpose of this demo, all content has been unlocked)

tutorial7.Name: Pelican
tutorial7.Text: To your right is main room of the ship. Gear up and go to Navigations to get into a mission!
